official_title: A bill to designate Sespe Creek and the Sisquoc River in the State of California as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified segments of the Sespe Creek and the Sisquoc River, California, as wild rivers.

titles.title: A bill to designate Sespe Creek and the Sisquoc River in the State of California as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
